name: Hampton Inn Waynesboro / Stuarts Draft

reviews.title: Really great!
reviews.text: This was a really great Hampton! It was sort of out in the middle of nowwhere but that was fine for just overnight. The pool was small but clean. There were lots of clean, fluffy towels for us to use and a hamper to but the dirty ones in. There was a bathroom right at the pool so we didn't have to drag wet kids though the lobby for one. The room was very clean and they gave each bed three pillows! The free breakfast was extensive and there was plenty of seating for everyone. On this trip we stayed in 4 different hotels and this was by far the best.

reviews.title: Great family hotel
reviews.text: HIGHS: friendliness of staff, cleanliness of room & public areas, spacious room, central location, value

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Clean, quiet and pleasant staff. I second all the positive reviews others have written. The hotel is only 6 years old. Nice indoor pool and a small gym. A microwave and small (quiet) refrigerator in our king-bed room. Nice linens, HBO and a big comfy chair, too. Good light to read by in bed.
reviews.title: Great Hampton Inn

reviews.text: Go one exit east for dinner. Skip the chains and have a great meal at the independent South River Grill. The clerk at the front desk recommended it, and was absolutely right.
reviews.title: Newer, clean, can't go wrong
Nice place to stay
reviews.text: This is a newer hotel, located about five minutes down the interstate from the Waynesboro exit. It is very clean and well maintained. Rooms are comfortable and the hotel meets the quality standards you always hope for in a Hampton Inn. I would definitely stay here again. By the way... while there is a nearby McDonald's, most food choices are one exit east (five minutes) down the interstate. where you can find a Shoney's, Cracker Barrel, Ruby Tuesday's, Applebees, and more. Adjacent to I-64, it is very quiet.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I've stayed at this Hampton several times now over the past two or three years and have been pleased with it each time.
reviews.title: Magnificent Hampton Inn

likes.disliked: — You can't go wrong with this hotel!

reviews.title: Greatest little Hampton Inn ever!
reviews.text: The lobby is cute and well maintained, as is the adjacent breakfast room. The complimentary breakfast is nice, nothing fancy, but quite acceptable.

The beds in this hotel were absolutely fantastic. We got a room with two Queen-size beds for ourselves and our two moderately young children, and the beds were huge, covered in a luxuriously thick comforter, and had marvelously crisp sheets. This hotel is relatively new (opened 2001), but I got the sense that everything was in great shape and absolutely clean not merely because it was new, but because the management and staff cares fiercely about taking good care of it.
reviews.title: Wonderful Choice for Exploring the Middle Shenandoah Valley

reviews.text: We found the location great for exploring the Shenandoah valley -- you're within a 40-mile drive by Interstate to a huge chunk of the valley's attractions, excluding only those in the northern end (Winchester/Harper's Ferry) and around Roanoke. The only drawbacks I can cite about this location were that the indoor swimming pool is relatively small -- good for children 11 or younger, but not much else -- and it's about a 6-7 mile drive up the interstate to the restaurants of Staunton. But you can do it in 10 minutes, and then return to a place that's wonderfully quiet. It's also well-suited for exploring Charlottesville, which was barely 20 minutes east. Finally, the staff was very helpful and friendly.
reviews.title: Great with kids
Great Value in Central VA
reviews.text: I stopped here based on the reviews on tripadvisor. They were all true. The clerk was being harried on the phone but had a great sense of humor. The rooms were great for the price, and the amenities were very nice. We would definitely stop in again.
Convenient to interstate, full (hot) breakfast, wieght room, indoor pool and small lobby area.
